frontmatter.title: Set up AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector On-Premises
frontmatter.description: In this tutorial, we will demonstrate installing  AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector (ADOT Collector) binaries for on-premises hosts. For supported platforms, see the ADOT Collector README on GitHub.
